Name: Ascension
Description: Ascend beyond mortal limits to achieve divine power temporarily.

Name: Circle
Description: Create protective circles that contain and amplify magical energies.

Name: Cosmic
Description: Align with cosmic forces to channel star and celestial magic.

Name: Elemental
Description: Converge multiple elemental forces into a unified powerful effect.

Name: Fountain
Description: Generate continuous streams of magical energy or resources.

Name: Planar
Description: Manipulate the fabric between planes and dimensions.

Name: Reality
Description: Anchor or alter the fundamental laws of reality itself.

Name: Resurrection
Description: Restore life to the fallen through powerful necromantic rituals.

Name: Sacrifice
Description: Offer blood or life force to gain immense temporary power.

Name: Summoning
Description: Call forth powerful entities from other planes to aid you.

Name: Temporal
Description: Bend time itself to freeze, accelerate, or reverse temporal flow.

Name: Transformation
Description: Transform yourself or others into different forms and shapes.

Name: Vortex
Description: Create swirling vortexes of magical energy that pull and damage.
